title: Song - the speaker's images in lines 25-28 suggest

content.prompt: In lines 25-28, the speaker’s images suggest that

choices.label: the speaker is profoundly affected by the beloved’s every emotion
the speaker sighs and weeps for the beloved
the beloved perceives and struggles to accept that the speaker is near death

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
